Music

Albums | Singles | Remixes | Mixes | Playlists

ALBUMS
The Now Now

Release date: 29th June 2018

Formats: Digital / CD / 12″ Vinyl / 12″ Vinyl (Blue) / 12″ Vinyl (Picture Disc) / Cassette

Where to listen: http://gorill.az/thenownow

The sixth studio album.

Tracklist:

Humility [feat. George Benson]
Tranz
Hollywood [feat. Snoop Dogg & Jamie Principle]
Kansas
Sorcererz
Idaho
Lake Zurich
Magic City
Fire Flies
One Percent
Souk Eye
SINGLES
Humility [feat. George Benson]

Release date: 31st May 2018

Formats: Digital

One of the two joint lead singles from The Now Now.

Lake Zurich

Release date: 31st May 2018

Formats: Digital

One of the two joint lead singles from The Now Now.

Sorcererz

Release date: 7th June 2018

Formats: Digital

The third single from The Now Now.

Fire Flies

Release date: 14th June 2018

Formats: Digital

The fourth single from The Now Now.

Hollywood [feat. Snoop Dogg & Jamie Principle]

Release date: 21st June 2018

Formats: Digital

The fifth single from The Now Now.

Tranz

Release date: 14th September 2018

Formats: Digital

The sixth and final single from The Now Now.

REMIXES
Humility (Remixes) [feat. George Benson]

Release date: 12th July 2018

Formats: Digital

Where to listen:

Track 1: http://gorill.az/humilityXsuperorganism
Track 2: http://gorill.az/humilityXDJkoze

Tracklist:

Humility (Superorganism Remix)
Humility (DJ Koze Remix)
Tranz (Poté Remix)

Release date: 28th September 2018

Formats: Digital

Tranz (Sibot Remix)

Release date: 15th November 2018

Formats: Digital

This remix was originally available via a (now-defunct) download code that came with every Gorillaz x G-Shock watch released in 2018.

MIXES
Goodhood – Good Vibes 68: Mixed by Gorillaz (Russel Hobbs)

Release date: 13th July 2018

Formats: Digital

The Now Now (Gorillaz 20 Mix)

Release date: 29th June 2021

Formats: Digital

G-Mix: 10

Release date: 10th August 2018

Continuing from Phase 4, the band members carried on updating their Spotify playlists; the series was later replaced with other sets of playlists before returning for Phase 6.

The Now Now Tour Setlist

Release date: 24th August 2018

This was later replaced with Gorillaz Turnz 20: Russel Edition.

Tracklist:

M1 A1
Tranz
Last Living Souls
Rhinestone Eyes
Tomorrow Comes Today
Every Planet We Reach Is Dead
Humility [feat. George Benson]
Sorcererz
Empire Ants [feat. Little Dragon]

On Melancholy Hill
El Mañana
Fire Flies
Strobelite [feat. Peven Everett]
Andromeda [feat. D.R.A.M.]
Hollywood [feat. Snoop Dogg & Jamie Principle]
Garage Palace [feat. Little Simz]

Demon Days
Don’t Get Lost In Heaven
Maydeup Festival

Release date: 2nd August 2019

A replacement to G-Mix: 10 that also saw four playlists (one per band member) released simultaneously; it was later replaced with Wish You Were Here.
